Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: A study by the Vermont nonprofit Crime Research Group shows Brattleboro police are dispatched most to the local Quality Inn, where the state is housing people otherwise without shelter (authorities received 181 calls there in the first half of this year), as well as to such downtown locations as the Whetstone path park (112 calls so far in 2024), the Groundworks Collaborative shelter (93) and Transportation Center parking garage (57).
